abstract: Rep Gabrielle Giffords will spend nearly two weeks in Asheville, NC, to receive additional therapy as she continues to recover from the January 8, 2011, shootings in Tucson.
snippet: Gabrielle Giffords will spend nearly two weeks in Asheville to receive additional therapy as she continues to recover from the Jan. 8 shootings in Tucson.
lead_paragraph: Gabrielle Giffords will spend nearly two weeks in Asheville to receive additional therapy as she continues to recover from the Jan. 8 shootings in Tucson.

headline.main: Giffords Arrives in North Carolina for More Treatment
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: More Therapy for Giffords
